Superior colliculus stratum zonale.CytoDefiningCriteria: Largely acellular layer lying on the outer surface of the superior colliculus
Superior colliculus stratum zonale.Definition: Most superficial layer of the superior colliculus consisting primarily of thin fibers derived primarily from the occipital cortex (Brodal, Neurological Anatomy, 2nd 3d, 1981, pg. 544)
